turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Derek Trucks.
turn.2: Derek Trucks Derek Trucks (born June 8, 1979) is an American guitarist, songwriter, and founder of the Grammy Award-winningThe Derek Trucks Band.
turn.3: What did he do with the Allman Brothers?
turn.4: He became an official member of The Allman Brothers Band in 1999.
turn.6: In 2010 he formed the Tedeschi Trucks Band with his wife, blues singer/guitarist Susan Tedeschi.
turn.7: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.8: His musical style encompasses several genres and he has twice appeared on "Rolling Stone"s list of 100 Greatest Guitarists of All Time.
turn.9: What else did he do with the Allman Brothers?
turn.10: He is the nephew of Butch Trucks, drummer for the Allman Brothers.
turn.12: Trucks was born in Jacksonville, Florida.
